And addresses everyone related to the global community by designing a Blockchain ecosystem and association which runs with "proof of green" incentive scheme. NERA's revolutionary understood that imaginable rebuilt and transform the mutual "green-think" by bringing awareness in everyone to devote environmental maintained in innovative methods. Using empowerment and incentive scheme, NERA plans to launch a decentralized autonomous program to build and maintain complete revenue is estimated as the premium for knowingly going green.  This is a visionary project that can motivate them to fight global emissions. NERA does maintain clear and has an approval tracking system to record users release reduction activities and the best among all shall be awarded Emission Reduction Unit (ERU). NERA in future is ready to build ERU a global standard to arrange the clean energy mark of every very personal and organization with its constitutional and are responsible for the clear and secured blockchain.  NERA inventing ERC-20 standard tokens to promote online and offline transaction within its ecosystem and expected that these tokens will be large in a detailed initial currency by the sphere of various organizations, traders and, retailers whoever supports NERA's clean energy revolution.
